meta.article_title: May 13, 2019 - First Block and First Counterloop

first_block_and_first_counterloop.probleme: Trouble blocking or counterlooping against opponent's opening loop against backspin

debutant.step: Get a partner and a bucket of balls. Server serves backspin, receiver pushes back long, server loops, receiver blocks or counterloops - but don't play out the point.

exercices_complementaires.description: Server loops, receiver blocks or counterloops.

metriques_progression.target: Practice reacting to a loop against backspin, over and over.
